query.statement: SELECT CASE WHEN QMT007A.JQPRNUM IS NULL THEN '5'|| SAPHEE.FILLINZERO(1,9) ELSE QMT007A.JQPRNUM END AS JQPRNUM FROM( SELECT ( '5' || SAPHEE.FILLINZERO(INTEGER(MAX(SUBSTR(JQPRNUM,2))) + 1,9) ) AS JQPRNUM FROM SAPHEE.ZQMT007 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# --AND JQPRNUM LIKE '5%' AND JQPRNUM >= '5000157317' -- 2019.02.08 속도이슈로 인한 임시적용. 윤철중 BJ님 요청 ) AS QMT007A WHERE 1=1 WITH UR
